Name: Century Hawk
Details: One of the JumpShips that carried the original expedition led by Samanthat Calderon that colonized the Hyades Cluster and founded the Taurian Concordat, the Century Hawk disappeared after the end of the Reunification War, after last being seen in the possession of pirates. In the centuries since its last confirmed sighting there have been several unconfirmed rumors of the ship appearing all over the Periphery.
